headline.main: GIANT U.S. TANKS LEAD TUNIS DRIVE; Huge Machines Lumbered Over Atlas Mountains to Join British Spearhead MADE 100 MILES A DAY French and Arabs Cheered as American Mammoths Rolled Through Towns

lead_paragraph: WITH AN AMERICAN TANK COLUMN IN TUNISIA, Nov. 24 Delayed) -- Huge American tanks with their heavy armament have made amazing headway over twisting roads and part of the Atlas Mountain chain, traveling more than 100 miles daily to arrive in time to aid the spearhead of the British First Army, of which, with other American units, they form a part.
abstract: US tanks travel 100 mi per day to join Brit 1st Army spearhead pressing on Tunis
